entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 02:43 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
